categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Redline was the call sign of the Commander of Black Eight Squadron, succeeding Juno Eclipse after her reassignment by Lord Darth Vader following the Bombing of Callos.

Redline was described by Captain Eclipse as "psychopathic" in her logs and in her experience he was the coldest, cruelest, least considerate being she had ever flown with. He was one of three pilots under her command who complained about their withdrawal from Callos.

He was also active during the Galactic Civil War, and at one point entered a dogfight with two X-wings while piloting a TIE/IT Interdictor starfighter, where he proceeded to fire homing missiles at both Rebel pilots.
